titleStmt.title: The craft of graffing and planting of trees

publicationStmt.publisher: In Lothbery ouer agay[n]st S. Margarets church by me Wyllyam Copland,

notesStmt.note: An edition of: The crafte of graffyng and plantynge of trees.
Place of publication and printer's name from colophon; publication date conjectured by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the University of Wisconsin, Madison, Wis. Library.
